title: Experiencing log in issues, if anyone can help me it would be greatly appreciated.
body: Whenever i try to log in, everything goes smoothly. It recognizes my account and then it just says authenticating for the remainder of the time. Thats it.

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing this login issue? If so, please work through our [**Login Issues guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues), as it addresses the most common causes for this to happen.

Let me know if you have any further issues.
can you maybe contact support about it? i tried and they couldnt help me.
YESSSS. SAME IDK WHY.. MAKES NO SENSE {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
